title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 §§ 358-3.8 - Agency conference
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 §§ 358-3.8 - Agency conference

State Regulations
(a) At any reasonable time before the date of
your fair hearing, you may request that the agency schedule an agency
conference before your fair hearing to review the agency decision for which you
have requested the fair hearing except as provided for in subdivision (c) of
this section. (b) Even though you
have not requested a fair hearing, you may request an agency conference to
review any action on your case. (c) No agency conference is required for actions involving the involuntary
discharge of residents of tier II facilities. Notes
